title: Chess & Life
headline: FIDE, USCF Chess Player
searchDescription: Growing up, I realized a chess game is just like a long journey of life.

title: Brave
headline: Life Far From My Homeland
searchDescription: There is always a second place that feels like home, I gotta adapt to a complete new world, outside of the bubble I was comforted inside.
longDescription:
Above is the picture of me and my hero.

'Her smile, a dawn, breaks through the gray,
Her strength, a tide, that washes care away.
When darkness falls, her love, a warming ray,
My constant hero, come what may.'

My constant hero, she is, and so much more.  This photo, softened by Christmas lights, isn't just an image – it's a moment from our romantic symphony, with her as its soul.

Her smile? The bright, hopeful opening movement. Her strength? The deeper, majestic chords, washing away all worries.  That cold night, bundled close, felt like a winter serenade, warmed by a quiet, profound love.

And those blurred golden lights?  Violins, weaving enchantment, echoing her constant, nurturing love—a warmth in darkness. More than my girlfriend, she's the hero of my heart, the muse of my soul's song. In this picture, we're romantically bound, two souls in perfect harmony.

title: Growth
headline: Gap Year Before Entering College
searchDescription: I explored myself in various versions. I become more freedom. I found peace in music. I found my soul in storytelling.

title: Confidence
headline: TEDx Speech: A Wary but Positive Look at AI
searchDescription: From a sitting duck to a motivational speaker, I aim to ignite hearts and minds, encouraging everyone to pursue their happinesses in life.
